documentation.text: @dev Add `minter` to the list of allowed minters.
@dev Add `minters` to the list of allowed minters.
@dev Revoke `_minter` from the list of allowed minters.
@dev Returns `true` if `account` has been granted to minters.

attributes.text: @dev Add `minter` to the list of allowed minters.
@dev Add `minters` to the list of allowed minters.
@dev Revoke `_minter` from the list of allowed minters.
@dev Returns `true` if `account` has been granted to minters.

addMinter(address).details: Add `minter` to the list of allowed minters.

addMinters(address[]).details: Add `minters` to the list of allowed minters.

isMinter(address).details: Returns `true` if `account` has been granted to minters.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeMinter(address).details: Revoke `_minter` from the list of allowed minters.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
